On August 26, 2025, Tech Mahindra received the 2025 Asia-Pacific Technology Innovation Leadership Recognition in Business Process Management from Frost & Sullivan . The recognition was for its accomplishments in digital transformation, intelligent automation, and AI-driven service delivery.

Other corporate news for TECHM from around the same time includes:

On August 28, 2025, O2 Telef√≥nica announced a collaboration with Tech Mahindra and NVIDIA to boost its "Service Experience Center" with a Large Telco Model.

On August 29, 2025, Tech Mahindra announced the liquidation of a wholly-owned subsidiary.

On July 3, 2025, Tech Mahindra and Aduna announced a partnership to accelerate telco monetization through network APIs.
